subject: ceasefire
body:
![image of a boy standing above rubble holding a palestinian flag with the text we broadcast to you the ceasefire on gaza](/letters/images/53.jpg)

![a man twirling sparkler fireworks in the rubble of a bombed building](/letters/images/52.jpg)

![a group of young men with skateboard waving a large palestinian flag](/letters/images/50.jpg)

![a man twirling sparkler fireworks in the rubble of a bombed building](/letters/images/49.jpg)

![bisan owta smiling in the sunshine in front of a palm](/letters/images/51.jpg)

![a man twirling sparkler fireworks in the rubble of a bombed building](/letters/images/55.jpg)

![women and children smiling](/letters/images/57.jpg)

![two people twirling sparklers in the rubble of a bombed building](/letters/images/56.jpg)

![a young girl renad waving a palestinian flag on a balcony](/letters/images/54.jpg)
